body: Rinju circus always pushes the envelope
He draws sfw manga on his twitter
@eat-pant oh shit, where did he say that?
@eat_pant: artist & character are too good to be stuck in d-gen pornland forever
@eat_pant i like JC sasha. it's cute. I just consider them different universes esp since he promised JC Sasha wouldn't be NTR

He made a post a while ago on fantia to the effect that someone had spoken to him about "being a good person worthy of sasha" or something to that effect, I think maybe some of his more degenerate comics got people around him talking, and this is the result of that conversation, idk.  I think this is a phase he is going through.  Hope to see more like d-kun and the ring gag girl, eventually.
I hate that Hagu now wants to turn Sasha into a sfw Takagi-clone after drawing this like this for years.
